turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Paulo, do you have time to order pizza for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, is this what you will be having for dinner?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm craving Round Table.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Do you want to look at the menu?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I already know what I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please order me an extra large King Arthur's Supreme?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I'm going to call and order an extra large King Arthur's Surpreme.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just ordered the pizza for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready to be picked up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you get a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are going to be sending it to you on your phone via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy your dinner.

items.name: Just ordered the pizza for you
